name: Chacha QingQi Wala
description:
QingQi Battle Arena

QingQi Battle Royale is a multiplayer with bots, 3D shooter in top-down isometric view, where you are being challenged to get yourself on top of the leaderboard by going all out with your QingQi and knockdown other QingQis that are in competition with you. Do your craziest driving skills and show em who's the true Chacha QingQi!

Let’s have a battle of the strongest and score high in the leaderboard. 

Team name 

Give us Five

Controls Shooting is automatic W- Move forward S- Move Backward A- Move Left D- Movie Right Features
  • Mini-Map
  • Destruction
  • Automatic Shooting
  • Scoring K/D System
  • Timer
  • Leaderboard
  • QingQi Controller
  • AI ( bots )
  • Matchmaking on MMR of the player
  • 3 Arenas to play in
Known Bugs For Future 
  • All Working UI/UX
  • Shop System
  • Season System
  • Customizations
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Create and Join Rooms system
  • Arenas Selections
  • QingQi Skins
